channel.title: CVE Feed for nvidia -- DGX A100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nvidia -- DGX A100

item.title: CVE-2023-31035|2024-08-30T19:10:51.835Z -- nvidia -- dgx%20a100
item.description: NVIDIA DGX A100 SBIOS contains a vulnerability where an attacker may cause an SMI callout vulnerability that could be used to execute arbitrary code at the SMM level. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to code execution, denial of service, escalation of privileges, and information disclosure.
